hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOWR.EOWR_CODE, EOWR.EOWR_DEFAULT_WH_CODE, EOWR.EOWR_DEFAULT_WH_NAME, EOWR.EOWR_CUSTOMER_CODE, EOWR.EOWR_CUSTOMER_NAME, EOWR.EOWR_IS_SPLIT_BY_STOCK, EOWR.EOWR_IS_ALLOT_NOTCOVER_WH FROM EO_ORDER_WH_RULE EOWR WHERE EOWR.REC_STATUS=0 << AND EOWR.EOWR_CUSTOMER_CODE LIKE :eowrCustomerCode >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_ORDER_TYPE_CODE LIKE :eowrOrderTypeCode >> << AND EOWR.EOWR_PROJECT_CODE LIKE :eowrProjectCode>> << AND EOWR.ORG_ID=:orgId >> ORDER BY EOWR.EOWR_PRIORITY DESC
